newsitem.title: UK: IFC sets 10 bln peseta 7-tranche index-linked bond.
newsitem.headline: IFC sets 10 bln peseta 7-tranche index-linked bond.

text.p: International Finance Corp has issued a seven-tranche index-linked bond, lead manager Banco Santander de Negocios said.
All tranches have an issue price 100.10 and a maturity of August 3, 2001. The paydate is July 17, 1997. Full fees are 10 basis points. All tranches are listed in Madrid.
